title: User Registration with 14-Day Free Trial
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid details and starts with a 14-day free trial.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter valid user details including email, username, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify registration is successful and user account is created with a 14-day free trial period.
Check confirmation email is sent to user.

title: Login with Valid Credentials
description: Check login succeeds with valid username/email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input registered username/email and correct password.
Click on the login button.
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard.

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Ensure login fails when using incorrect username/email or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input an incorrect or unregistered username/email and/or password.
Click the login button.
Verify login fails and appropriate error message is displayed.

title: Dashboard Data Load Performance
description: Verify dashboard loads all required data and visualizations within 3 seconds under normal load conditions.

steps.description: Login with a valid user account.
Access the dashboard page.
Verify that dashboard data and visualizations load completely within 3 seconds.
Check dashboard uptime and responsiveness throughout multiple access attempts.

title: Real-time Radio and Spotify Data Synchronization
description: Confirm that the platform synchronizes and displays real-time radio and Spotify streaming data accurately.

steps.description: Trigger data refresh or access dashboard displaying top songs from radio and Spotify.
Verify real-time radio airplay data is current and reflects latest plays from major Brazilian radio stations.
Verify Spotify streaming metrics including playlist analytics and detailed streaming data are up to date.

title: Dashboard Filters by Genre, Region, and Radio Station
description: Verify that dashboard filters correctly filter displayed data by genre, region, and radio station.

steps.description: Access the dashboard and open filtering options.
Select different genres from filter dropdown and apply.
Verify dashboard updates to show only data corresponding to selected genres.
Apply region filters one by one and verify data update accordingly.
Filter by specific radio stations and validate displayed information is correct.

title: Comparative Dashboard for Radio vs Streaming Performance
description: Verify the comparative dashboard accurately shows performance gaps and trends between radio airplay and streaming platforms.

steps.description: Navigate to the comparative dashboard section.
Validate that performance metrics from radio airplay and streaming sources are displayed side by side.
Verify trend charts update correctly when changing the time frame or applying filters.

title: User Subscription Payment via Stripe Checkout
description: Verify users can successfully subscribe to plans, process payments through Stripe, and that subscription lifecycle is correctly handled.

steps.description: Login with valid user account.
Navigate to subscription payment page.
Select a subscription plan and proceed to Stripe checkout.
Submit valid payment details on Stripe's page.
Verify payment succeeds, subscription is activated, and confirmation is shown to user.
Simulate Stripe webhook notifications and verify subscription status updates correctly in the platform.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Ensure that access to user management, admin functionalities, and system settings is correctly restricted based on user roles.

steps.description: Login as a regular user.
Attempt to access administrative routes and features.
Verify access is denied with appropriate error messages.
Login as an administrator user.
Access administrative routes such as system settings and usage reports.
Verify access is granted and administrative data is displayed correctly.

title: File Upload Validation and Security
description: Verify that file upload for logos and images accepts only allowed file types and sizes, stores files securely, and prevents data loss.

steps.description: Login with authorized user account.
Attempt to upload a valid image file within size limits.
Verify file uploads successfully and displays in user interface.
Attempt to upload an invalid file type or oversized file.
Verify upload is rejected with a clear error message.

title: REST API Status Codes and Error Handling
description: Validate that all API endpoints return appropriate status codes and error messages for success, client errors, and server errors.

steps.description: Send valid requests to key APIs: dashboard, streams, users, payments, uploads, admin.
Verify HTTP 200 or 201 status codes and valid response data.
Send malformed or unauthorized requests to these APIs.
Verify API responds with appropriate client error codes such as 400, 401, 403, and descriptive error messages.
Simulate server errors or unavailable resources.
Verify API responds with appropriate 500-series status codes and handles errors gracefully.

title: Compliance with LGPD Data Protection Requirements
description: Verify the platform complies with LGPD by ensuring personal data privacy, security, and proper consent management.

steps.description: Review user registration, data storage, and data access flows.
Verify personal data is collected only with user consent.
Check that data is encrypted in storage and transmission.
Test user requests for data access, correction, or deletion.
Verify user requests are handled correctly according to LGPD regulations.

title: System Notifications Delivery
description: Verify users receive system notifications for significant platform changes and subscription updates.

steps.description: Trigger a system notification event such as subscription renewal or new feature release.
Verify user receives the notification via the platform interface and/or email.

title: API Authentication and Authorization
description: Ensure APIs enforce authentication schemes (BasicAuth, Bearer tokens) and reject unauthorized access.

steps.description: Send API requests to secure endpoints without authentication headers.
Verify API responds with 401 Unauthorized error.
Send API requests with invalid or expired tokens.
Verify API denies access and returns error.
Send API requests with valid tokens.
Verify access is granted only to permitted resources.

title: Database Optimization Scripts Execution and Effectiveness
description: Verify that database optimization scripts run successfully and improve data retrieval and dashboard performance.

steps.description: Execute provided SQL optimization scripts on staging database.
Verify scripts complete without errors.
Measure query performance and dashboard load times before and after optimization.
Confirm performance improvements as expected.

title: File Upload Security and Storage Integrity
description: Test that uploaded logo and image files are securely stored and accessible only to authorized users without data loss or corruption.

steps.description: Upload a valid image file as an authenticated user.
Verify file is stored securely and can be retrieved accurately.
Attempt to access uploaded files without authorization.
Verify unauthorized access is prevented.

title: Spotify Playlist and Audio Preview Interaction
description: Verify that users can explore Spotify playlist data and play audio previews within the platform with smooth user experience.

steps.description: Login and navigate to Spotify integration dashboard area.
Select a playlist and view associated analytics.
Confirm playlist data loads correctly and statistics display accurately.
Click on audio previews for selected songs.
Verify audio previews play without error and controls respond properly.
